title: maxtango.com logo connected geometric sans
content:
anybody here know the name of this unusual font? i kinda like it. very few practical or appropriate venues for it, though.

thanks in advance,  
Dr. Theopolis

 [‹ (x) "Stephen Bayley / General Knowledge" chunky poster font - VMR {Biff Rose}](http://web.archive.org/web/20090405165929/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31644 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) S.KO Cool sans - Frutiger {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090405165929/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31647 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DocTheop

comments.content: sorry but I can’t see it... :-(

If you are looking for the font used below, my best bet would be that is custom, just constructed of some simple shapes in Illustrator. But you can find many similar ones on Da Font in theTechno section...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090405165929im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/maxtango_logo_full_blue_3773.jpg)
thanks... i found one on Da Font that “close enough for government purposes” (as my father liked to say).
